name: src/utils/geolocation.js
GeolocationUtils
description: Geolocation utilities

name: enable
description:
Registers a handler function that will be called automatically each time
the position of the device changes. You can also, optionally, specify an
error handling callback function.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a {@link Position} object as an input parameter.

params.name: errorCallback
params.description: Takes a {@link PositionError} object as an input parameter.

return.description:
A watch ID value that then can be used to unregister
the handler using {@link GeolocationUtils.disable}

name: getCurrent
description: Gets the current position of the device.

params.name: callback
params.description: Takes a {@link Position} object as an input parameter.

params.name: errorCallback
params.description: Takes a {@link PositionError} object as an input parameter.

name: disable
description:
unregister location/error monitoring handlers previously installed
using {@link GeolocationUtils.enable}

params.name: watcher
params.description: Watch ID value returned by {@link GeolocationUtils.enable}

name: distance
description: Calculates the distance between two points on Earth

name: src/utils/image.js
ImageUtils
description: Image utilities

name: getFileData
description: Promise that reads an image file and returns the file data when finished

name: src/utils/index.js
src/utils/string.js
StringUtils
description: String utilities

name: serialize
description: Takes an object and converts it into a query string

name: src/views/google-map/google-map.model.js
GoogleMapModel
description: Controls communication and handling of the Google Maps JavaScript API

name: constructor
description: Initialises the map using Google Maps JavaScript API

params.name: apiKey
params.description: Google provides this in their console

params.name: $el
params.description: The element where the map will be rendered

name: apiKey
description: Google's API key

name: $el
description: The element where the map will be rendered

name: options
description: Google Maps options

name: map
description: The map instance from Google Maps JavaScript API

name: INIT_CALLBACK
description: The callback name attached to the Google's script library

name: READY_CALLBACK
description: The callback name triggered when the Google's script library is called

name: initGoogleMap
description:
Initialises the Google Maps JavaScript library and safely calls {@link renderMap}

There are three ways this can go down:

1. It's the first map added to the page and the script library has not been included yet
2. The library was included and INIT_CALLBACK already triggered
3. The library was included but it has not initialised yet

name: addListener
description: Adds map listener

name: renderMap
description: Renders the map in the chosen {@link $el}

name: src/views/google-map/google-map.view.js
GoogleMap

properties.name: apiKey
properties.description: Google provides this in their console

properties.name: options
properties.description: Options passed when map is initialised

properties.name: onInit
properties.description: Triggers when the map is ready and rendered

properties.name: onBoundsChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the viewport bounds have changed.

properties.name: onCenterChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the map center property changes.

properties.name: onClick
properties.description:
Triggers when the user clicks on the map.
  An ApiMouseEvent with properties for the clicked location is returned unless a place
  icon was clicked, in which case an IconMouseEvent with a placeid is returned.
  IconMouseEvent and ApiMouseEvent are identical, except that IconMouseEvent has the
  placeid field. The event can always be treated as an ApiMouseEvent when the placeid
  is not important. The click event is not fired if a marker or infowindow was clicked.

properties.name: onDoubleClick
properties.description:
Triggers when the user double-clicks on the map.
  Note that the click event will also fire, right before this one.

properties.name: onDrag
properties.description: This event is repeatedly fired while the user drags the map.

properties.name: onDragEnd
properties.description: Triggers when the user stops dragging the map.

properties.name: onDragStart
properties.description: Triggers when the user starts dragging the map.

properties.name: onHeadingChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the map heading property changes.

properties.name: onIdle
properties.description: Triggers when the map becomes idle after panning or zooming.

properties.name: onMapTypeIdChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the mapTypeId property changes.

properties.name: onMouseMove
properties.description: Triggers whenever the user's mouse moves over the map container.

properties.name: onMouseOut
properties.description: Triggers when the user's mouse exits the map container.

properties.name: OnMouseOver
properties.description: Triggers when the user's mouse enters the map container.

properties.name: onProjectionChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the projection has changed.

properties.name: onRightClick
properties.description: Triggers when the DOM contextmenu event is fired on the map container.

properties.name: onTilesLoaded
properties.description: Triggers when the visible tiles have finished loading.

properties.name: onTiltChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the map tilt property changes.

properties.name: onZoomChanged
properties.description: Triggers when the map zoom property changes.

name: src/views/image-uploader/image-uploader.view.js
ImageUploader

properties.name: id
properties.description: The same `id` added to the input field

properties.name: name
properties.description: The same `name` added to the input field

properties.name: caption
properties.description: Caption text added at the bottom of the field

properties.name: src
properties.description: Default image path when nothing is selected

properties.name: fileSize
properties.description: Maximum file size (Kb) accepted

name: src/views/index.js
src/views/navigation/navigation.view.js
Navigation

properties.name: location
properties.description: Comes from the {@link react-router-dom~withRouter} function

properties.name: routes
properties.description: Same {@link Route} object defined in {@link PageControl}

name: src/views/page-control/page-control.view.js
PageControl

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the section to load. It will appear in the header of navigation

properties.name: to
properties.description: The path to the page it will go to

properties.name: component
properties.description: The component it will load below the {@link Navigation}

properties.name: base
properties.description: The base URL used in `Router`'s `basename` attribute: default is `/`

properties.name: routes
properties.description: All possible routes available

content:
# @orloxx/ui-core

> UI Core Components for React

[![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@orloxx/ui-core.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@orloxx/ui-core)
[![JavaScript Style Guide](https://img.shields.io/badge/code_style-standard-brightgreen.svg)](https://standardjs.com)
[![Documentation Coverage](https://orloxx.github.io/ui-core/docs/badge.svg)](https://orloxx.github.io/ui-core/docs/)

This is an attempt to create a components library to bootstrap React SPAs.

## Install

```bash
npm install --save @orloxx/ui-core
```

## Usage

```jsx
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { PageControl } from '@orloxx/ui-core';

class SomeComponent extends Component {
  return (
    <PageControl ... />
  );
}
```

This is a work in progress, you can check out the `/example` folder which is deployed [here](http://orloxx.github.io/ui-core).

For more information check out [the documentation](https://orloxx.github.io/ui-core/docs/) which is autogenerated using [ESDoc](https://esdoc.org/).

## Donate

I can always use a beer 🍺 or two :)

Bitcoin: `1sSBBuBgnapZ1Zxmf9PYoBMxv8kN6Wggb`

![Donate Bitcoin](https://github.com/orloxx/ui-core/raw/develop/example/src/views/home/bitcoin.jpg)

## License

MIT © [orloxx](https://github.com/orloxx)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@orloxx/ui-core",
  "version": "1.0.10",
  "description": "UI Core Components for React",
  "author": "orloxx",
  "license": "MIT",
  "repository": "github:orloxx/ui-core",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "module": "dist/index.es.js",
  "jsnext:main": "dist/index.es.js",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8",
    "npm": ">=5"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "cross-env CI=1 react-scripts test --env=jsdom",
    "test:watch": "react-scripts test --env=jsdom",
    "build": "rollup -c",
    "start": "rollup -c -w",
    "predeploy": "npm run build-example && npm run docs",
    "build-example": "cd example && npm run build",
    "deploy": "gh-pages -d example/build",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc -c .esdoc.json"
  },
  "peerDependencies": {
    "@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core": "^1.2.17",
    "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons": "^5.8.1",
    "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome": "^0.1.4",
    "node-sass": "^4.11.0",
    "prop-types": "^15.7.2",
    "react": "^16.8.6",
    "react-dom": "^16.8.6",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core": "^1.2.17",
    "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons": "^5.8.1",
    "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome": "^0.1.4",
    "prop-types": "^15.7.2",
    "react-router-dom": "^5.0.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.3",
    "babel-plugin-external-helpers": "^6.22.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.7.0",
    "babel-preset-react": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-stage-0": "^6.24.1",
    "cross-env": "^5.1.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.0.1",
    "eslint-config-standard": "^11.0.0",
    "eslint-config-standard-react": "^6.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.13.0",
    "eslint-plugin-node": "^7.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-standard": "^3.1.0",
    "gh-pages": "^1.2.0",
    "react": "^16.8.6",
    "react-dom": "^16.8.6",
    "react-scripts": "3.0.0",
    "rollup": "^0.64.1",
    "rollup-plugin-babel": "^3.0.7",
    "rollup-plugin-commonjs": "^9.1.3",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^3.3.0",
    "rollup-plugin-peer-deps-external": "^2.2.0",
    "rollup-plugin-url": "^1.4.0"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "scss"
  ]
}
